summary: A young woman about to be married begins having terrifying dreams about demons. When she wakes, however, the demons are real and begin to commit gruesome murders.
cast: Jemma Redgrave|Kathleen Wilhoite|Timothy Spall|Jimmy Nail|Mark Greenstreet|Susan Fleetwood|Annabelle Lanyon|Nickolas Grace|Patrick O'Connell|Andrew Jones|Richard Warner
